languages.text: {n}Облава Инквизиции на логово богомерзких еретиков прошла успешно — десятки высокопоставленных аристократов, почитающих Губительные силы, были истреблены. В битве против демона, призванного ими в пылу злобной мести, пала леди Сюэ и ближайшие ее помощники.{/n}

{n}The Inquisition's raid on the heretics' lair was successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats who worshipped the Ruinous Powers were exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies fell in a battle against a daemon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Облава Инквизиции на логово богомерзких еретиков прошла успешно — десятки высокопоставленных аристократов, почитающих Губительные силы, были истреблены. В битве против демона, призванного ими в пылу злобной мести, пала леди Сюэ и ближайшие ее помощники.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisition's raid of the lair of the blasphemous heretics had been successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats, revering the Ruinous Powers cult, have been exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies have fallen n a battle against a demon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}审判庭对异端分子的巢穴发动了突袭。战况非常顺利，数十名崇拜毁灭之力邪教的高级贵族在这场突袭中毙命。残存的邪教徒为了复仇，召唤出了恶魔，而薛女士和她的盟友们则在与恶魔的战斗中牺牲了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition's raid on the heretics' lair was successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats who worshipped the Ruinous Powers were exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies fell in a battle against a daemon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}审判庭对异端分子的巢穴发动了突袭。战况非常顺利，数十名崇拜毁灭之力邪教的高级贵族在这场突袭中毙命。残存的邪教徒为了复仇，召唤出了恶魔，而薛女士和她的盟友们则在与恶魔的战斗中牺牲了。{/n}
{n}审判庭对渎神的异端巢穴发动了突袭，并取得了成功，数十名信奉毁灭之力邪教的高级贵族在突袭中毙命。残存的邪教徒为了复仇，召唤出了恶魔，而薛女士和她的盟友们则在与恶魔的战斗中牺牲了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La incursión de la Inquisición en la guarida de los herejes tuvo éxito: exterminaron a una veintena de aristócratas de alto rango que veneraban a los Poderes Ruinosos. Lady Xue y sus aliados cayeron en batalla contra un daemon invocado por el culto en venganza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition's raid on the heretics' lair was successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats who worshipped the Ruinous Powers were exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies fell in a battle against a daemon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La incursión de la Inquisición en la guarida de los herejes tuvo éxito: exterminaron a una veintena de aristócratas de alto rango que veneraban a los Poderes Ruinosos. Lady Xue y sus aliados cayeron en batalla contra un daemon invocado por el culto en venganza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}冒涜的な異端者たちの隠れ家に仕掛けた異端審問庁の襲撃は成功した...〈禍つ神々〉を崇拝する数十人もの高位貴族が滅ぼし尽くされた。レディ・シュエとその仲間は、魔女団が復讐として召喚した悪魔との戦いで倒れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition's raid on the heretics' lair was successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats who worshipped the Ruinous Powers were exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies fell in a battle against a daemon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冒涜的な異端者たちの隠れ家に仕掛けた異端審問庁の襲撃は成功した...〈禍つ神々〉を崇拝する数十人もの高位貴族が滅ぼし尽くされた。レディ・シュエとその仲間は、魔女団が復讐として召喚した悪魔との戦いで倒れた。{/n}
{n}冒涜的な異端者たちの隠れ家に仕掛けた異端審問庁の襲撃は成功した...〈禍つ神々〉を崇拝する数十人もの高位貴族が滅ぼし尽くされた。レディ・シュエとその仲間は、魔女団が復讐として召喚した悪魔との戦いで倒れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'assaut de l'Inquisition sur le repaire d'hérétiques est couronné de succès ; des dizaines d'aristocrates de haut rang vénérant les Puissances de la Ruine sont assassinés. Peu après, dame Xue et ses alliés trouvent la mort en combattant un démon invoqué par le culte en guise de représailles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition's raid on the heretics' lair was successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats who worshipped the Ruinous Powers were exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies fell in a battle against a daemon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'assaut de l'Inquisition sur le repaire d'hérétiques est couronné de succès ; des dizaines d'aristocrates de haut rang vénérant les Puissances de la Ruine sont assassinés. Peu après, dame Xue et ses alliés trouvent la mort en combattant un démon invoqué par le culte en guise de représailles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Angriff der Inquisition auf das Versteck der Ketzer war erfolgreich. Dutzende hochrangige Adelige, die die Mächte der Zerstörung verehrt hatten, wurden getötet. Lady Xue und ihre Verbündeten fielen im Kampf mit einem Dämon, den der Kult gerufen hatte, um sich zu rächen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition's raid on the heretics' lair was successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats who worshipped the Ruinous Powers were exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies fell in a battle against a daemon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Angriff der Inquisition auf das Versteck der Ketzer war erfolgreich. Dutzende hochrangige Adelige, die die Mächte der Zerstörung verehrt hatten, wurden getötet. Lady Xue und ihre Verbündeten fielen im Kampf mit einem Dämon, den der Kult gerufen hatte, um sich zu rächen.{/n}

{n}Der Angriff der Inquisition auf das Versteck der blasphemischen Ketzer war erfolgreich. Dutzende von hochrangigen Aristokraten, welche die Mächte der Zerstörung anbeteten, wurden ausgelöscht. Lady Xue und ihre Verbündeten sind in einem Kampf gegen einen Dämonen gefallen, den der Kult aus Rache herbeigerufen hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Engizisyon'un kâfirlerin inine düzenlediği baskın başarılı oldu. Yıkıcı Güçler'e tapan yüksek rütbeli onlarca aristokrat ortadan kaldırıldı. Leydi Xue ile müttefikleri, tarikat tarafından intikam hamlesi olarak çağrılan bir iblise karşı çatışırken can verdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisition's raid on the heretics' lair was successful — dozens of high-ranking aristocrats who worshipped the Ruinous Powers were exterminated. Lady Xue and her allies fell in a battle against a daemon summoned by the cult as an act of vengeance.{/n}
